Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.board

Class SpecialCharacter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.board.SpecialCharacter
public class SpecialCharacter extends Object
The character card containing the corresponding effect
Author:
Riccardo Milici

  • Constructor Details

    • SpecialCharacter

      public SpecialCharacter(int id, Map<HouseColor,Integer> students)
      Class constructor. It creates an instance of the class containing the given specific effect object and identified by the given numeric id.
      Parameters:
      id - The identification number of the special character card.
      students - A map with the students to put on the card (null, otherwise).

    • SpecialCharacter

      public SpecialCharacter(int statusId, int statusEffectCost, boolean statusAlreadyPaid, boolean statusPaidInTurn, boolean statusIsActive, Map<HouseColor,Integer> statusStudents, int bans, int usesNumber)
      Class constructor used to restore the game.
      Parameters:
      statusId - The identification number of the special character card.
      statusEffectCost - The special character's activation cost.
      statusAlreadyPaid - True if the special character has already been paid, and it's effect has already been activated during this game.
      statusPaidInTurn - True if the special character has already been paid, and it's effect has already been activated during this turn.
      statusIsActive - True if the special character's effect is active.
      statusStudents - The students on the card.
      bans - The number of available bans.
      usesNumber - The number of uses.

  • Method Details

    • getEffectBy

      private Effect getEffectBy(int id, Map<HouseColor,Integer> students, int bans)
      Gets the effect according to its identification number.
      Parameters:
      id - The identification number of the effect.
      Returns:
      The required effect.

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Returns the identification number of the object.
      Returns:
      id attribute

    • getEffectCost

      public int getEffectCost()
      Returns the actual cost of the effect assigned to the object: the effect's native cost if it has never been activated; the native cost increased by 1 if it has already been activated.
      Returns:
      effectCost or effectCost+1 attribute

    • getEffect

      public Effect getEffect()
      Returns the instance of the specific effect assigned to the object.
      Returns:
      assignedEffect attribute
